title.rendered: INNS OF MONTEREY ANNOUNCE HOLIDAY GETAWAY

content.rendered:
–Plan now, play later–

MONTEREY, Calif., Nov. 29, 2023 /PRNewswire/ — With the holiday season on the horizon, now is the perfect time to book a getaway to Monterey for a romantic retreat, adventure travel, or family trip. Inns of Monterey offer the ideal home base for holiday revelers, including Casa Munras Garden Hotel & Spa, Spindrift Inn, Monterey Bay Inn, Wave Street Inn, and Victorian Inn. 

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/inns-of-monterey-announce-holiday-getaway-302001082.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
